rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0001
rows.name:
New customers? Hello! Welcome to
the best restaurant in the capital - if
I do say so myself.

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Although...I have to admit I've had a bit
of a rough time lately and it's affecting
my cooking...

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm lucky to have regulars who'll gladly
eat here all the same, but... I don't
want them to be satisfied with less!

rows.label: tlk70000030_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Er...sorry. Anyway... Were you looking
to have a meal? I'll cook but I can't
really recommend anything.
